mapper.select: select e.*, (select dept_title from dept where dept_code=e.dept_code) dept_title, (select job_title from job where job_code = e.job_code) job_title from emp e where emp_id = #{empId}
mapper.insert: insert into emp values( #{empId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{ssn}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phone}, default, null, default, #{jobCode}, #{deptCode} )
